step.cmd: On the home screen, click the Messages icon.

In the To field, fill in one or more recipients. typing an email address or a contact name. You can enter more than one email addresses separated by comma. As you enter email addresses, any matching addresses from your contacts list are displayed. You can also type as recipients a contact name or contact groups.
Select the Show Cc/Bcc icon if you want to fill in the Cc or a Bcc fields.
Enter the subject, and then compose your message.
To send the message, press the Send key.
